content: quick fan & feather scarf / shawlette inspired by abyssal materials yarn knit one crochet too fleurtini violets 1 skein - 219yd/200m or any worsted or dk weight yarn you chose pattern will work with both weights and same sized needles needles us # 7 - 32 circulars for stockinet short row us # 9 32 circulars for fan & feather markers 11 place markers after every 18sts fan and feather repeat yarn needle to weave in ends note if you desire a longer scarf/shawlette add increments of 36sts to your cast on for example 218+36=254sts to co or 218+72=290sts to co make sure you add more yarn yardage too co 218sts with us #9 circulars work 2 row of garter stitch place markers after each 18 stitch fan & feather repeat as you work the first row of the fan & feather pattern fan & feather pattern row 1 sl 1 pwise * k2tog 3xs yo k1 6xs ssk 3xs* repeat from * end k1 row 2 sl 1 pwise purl to last stitch end k1 row 3 sl 1 pwise knit across entire row row 4 sl 1 pwise knit across entire row repeat the 4 row pattern 3 times you can repeat it 4 or 5 times if making a larger version remove the stitch markers as you work the last knit row of the last repeat 1 change to us #7-32 circulars you are now going to work short row in stockinet row 1 rs sl 1 pwise knit 112sts pm on lhn turn row 2 ws p8 sl 1 to rhn yb pm on lhn slip the slipped stitch back to lhn turn row 3 yb k7 slip next st to rhn remove the marker on lhn slip the st back to lhn k2og k3 slip next st to rhn yf pm on lhn slip st back to lhn turn row 4 yf p11 slip next st to rhn remove marker slip st back to lhn p2tog p3 slip next stitch to rhn yb pm on lhn slip st back to lhn turn row 5 yb knit to 1 st before the marker slip the st to rhn remove the marker on lhn slip the stitch back to the lhn k2tog k3 slip 1 st to rhn pm on lhn yf slip stitch back to lhn turn row 6 yf purl to 1 st before marker slip the st to rhn remove the marker on lhn slip the stitch back to the lhn p2tog p3 slip 1 st to rhn pm on lhn yb slip_stitch back to lhn turn repeat row 5 & 6 until you have 5 unworked stitches at the end of the knit row rs and 4 unworked stitches at the end of the purl row ws last rs row 5 yb knit to 1 st before the marker slip the st to rhn remove marker on lhn slip the stitch back to the lhn end with k2og k4 last ws row
